name: The Mission of Dog Gamer
description: In a world where humans no longer exist because of wars, the only ones left were humanoid animals that currently live like humans lived so peacefully, but there is a very important company associated with secret missions and with the government where animals are very good and smart work and this company is made of very well trained secret agents, but a couple of agents who are 2 best friends don't fit that description very well and these two are: gamer dog and gamer cat, and these two are always placed as the worst in the rankings but still they love what they do and in this game they will have to face an organization that is trying to end the organization of secret agents and also want to bring the monsters of the human race back to life and with They will rule the entire world, and Gamer Dog and Gamer Cat are called to stop them.
